scripts.clean:backend: cd Backend && docker-compose down -v && docker-compose build --no-cache
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:backend
scripts.backend:shell: cd Backend && docker-compose exec backend bash
scripts.backend:composer: cd Backend && docker-compose exec backend composer install
scripts.backend:composer-update: cd Backend && docker-compose exec backend composer update
scripts.backend:migrate: cd Backend && docker-compose exec backend php bin/console doctrine:migrations:migrate --no-interaction
scripts.backend:fresh: npm run backend:down && npm run backend:build && npm run backend:up
scripts.setup: npm run clean:backend-deps && npm install && npm run backend:fresh && sleep 15 && npm run backend:migrate
scripts.setup:quick: npm install && npm run backend:up && sleep 10 && npm run backend:migrate
